DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial among woman deliver cesarean UNC Women 's Hospital desire Intrauterine Device ( IUD ) contraception postpartum . After consent , woman randomize receive IUD time cesarean delivery postpartum visit 4-8 week later . After randomization , subject give choice Mirena® IUD Paragard® IUD . Data collection occur baseline , delivery , 4-8 week postpartum visit , 2 follow-up encounter 3 6 month . We hypothesize woman receive IUD time cesarean likely use IUD 6 month later woman plan receive IUD 4-8 week delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Postplacental Insertion IUDs Time Cesarean Delivery : A Randomized Clinical Trial
